alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grayson; Smyth; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Smyth, southeastern Wythe, western Carroll and central Grayson Counties and the City of Galax through 445 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elk Creek, or near Speedwell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galax... Fries... Speedwell... Sugar Grove... Flatridge... Ivanhoe... and Elk Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
